snippet: As recently as 2010, Jack Lew, President Obama's nominee to be the next Treasury secretary, had $56,000 invested in a CitiGroup venture capital fund based in the Cayman Islands.
abstract: As recently as 2010, Jack Lew, President Obama's nominee to be the next Treasury secretary, had $56,000 invested in a CitiGroup venture capital fund based in the Cayman Islands.

headline.main: Lew's Cayman Islands Fund a Likely Issue at Confirmation Hearings
